XORP Mailing Lists

The following mailing lists are all hosted at the xorp.org domain.

List Purpose Options
 xorp-announce  XORP Release and Milestone announcements list  Join | Archives
 xorp-hackers  XORP software developer discussion Join | Archives
 xorp-users  General XORP router discussion and anything fits nowhere else Join | Archives
 xorp-cvs  XORP source commit messages and related discussion   Join | Archives
